actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Finance.

Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department, Agriculture Department.

official_title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress concerning the reduction of tariffs by Japan.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that: (1) Japan should reduce its tariffs on processed wood products, including plywood, particleboard, veneer, and lumber; and (2) any refusal to reduce such tariffs will impede the development of trade relations with the United States.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of the Congress concerning the reduction of tariffs by Japan.
